data.name: Western Dual Wield Demo
data.detailed_description:
Western theme
Voxel Graphics
Forced-scrolling twin-stick shooter
Attack the enemy with two guns
Reload when out of ammo
Rolling to avoid enemy attacks
Meat Shield when you catch an enemy while rolling
You can also throw that enemy and use it as a meat bullet
Chain bonus is an important score attack feature

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 7, 8, 8.1, 10 x64
  • Processor: Intel Pentium E2180 (2 * 2000) or equivalent
  • Memory: 1 GB RAM
  • Graphics: GeForce 7600 GT (256 MB)
  • Storage: 600 MB available space
